TextLibrary.Text: Tauron Flamebite
I did not expect you to return.
I did not expect you to return.
I did not expect you to return.
I did not expect you to return.
Why not? What is that gruesome thing you sent me to see?
Why not? What is that gruesome thing you sent me to see?
Why not? What is that gruesome thing you sent me to see?
Why not? What is that gruesome thing you sent me to see?
Most outsiders who see the Pike end up as part of it. It serves as a warning to those who are foolish enough to travel here.
Most outsiders who see the Pike end up as part of it. It serves as a warning to those who are foolish enough to travel here.
Most outsiders who see the Pike end up as part of it. It serves as a warning to those who are foolish enough to travel here.
Most outsiders who see the Pike end up as part of it. It serves as a warning to those who are foolish enough to travel here.
I don't have the luxury of heeding petty warnings. Many of my people have been taken as slaves by Orcs, and I need to find them. I want you to tell me where they are.
I don't have the luxury of heeding petty warnings. Many of my people have been taken as slaves by Orcs, and I need to find them. I want you to tell me where they are.
I don't have the luxury of heeding petty warnings. Many of my people have been taken as slaves by Orcs, and I need to find them. I want you to tell me where they are.
I don't have the luxury of heeding petty warnings. Many of my people have been taken as slaves by Orcs, and I need to find them. I want you to tell me where they are.
I do not know.
I do not know.
I do not know.
I do not know.
But you're a Minotaur, and Minotaurs rule this land. You MUST know.
But you're a Minotaur, and Minotaurs rule this land. You MUST know.
But you're a Minotaur, and Minotaurs rule this land. You MUST know.
But you're a Minotaur, and Minotaurs rule this land. You MUST know.
We are NOT common Minotaurs! We are FIREWALKERS! We are the Guardians of Sartek's sacred flame and we await his return. We do not trifle with Orcs.
We are NOT common Minotaurs! We are FIREWALKERS! We are the Guardians of Sartek's sacred flame and we await his return. We do not trifle with Orcs.
We are NOT common Minotaurs! We are FIREWALKERS! We are the Guardians of Sartek's sacred flame and we await his return. We do not trifle with Orcs.
We are NOT common Minotaurs! We are FIREWALKERS! We are the Guardians of Sartek's sacred flame and we await his return. We do not trifle with Orcs.
But you're still Minotaurs; you must know SOMETHING.
But you're still Minotaurs; you must know SOMETHING.
But you're still Minotaurs; you must know SOMETHING.
But you're still Minotaurs; you must know SOMETHING.
You think us ordinary Minotaurs? Then face one of my shamans in battle!
